name: Arrrvest
description:
Arrrvest - A  pirate farming game by Vaughn Langen (SgtWeirdo.itch.io) & Nico Jürgens (LewLhere.itch.io)
Explore the oceans and battle pirates! Pick your destination by clicking on one of the unlocked targets. The yellow number indicates the turns it will take to arrive there. Choose wisely... Plant specific seeds which will grow into harvestable plants after a couple of turns. Upgrade you Hull, Cannon, Sail & Deck for better fighting stats - and a stronger economy!


Beat the pirate encounters for booty, to progress through the map - and to eventually defeat the mighty Cap'n of the Soularrrvester.
